movie.title: Scramble
movie.description_intro: A man races against time to pay off a debtor who forces his girlfriend into prostitution. Two murderers show up and start killing the town's prostitutes. He meets a wealthy thug who he makes a deal with to get the money, but he might have just run out of time.
movie.description_full: A man races against time to pay off a debtor who forces his girlfriend into prostitution. Two murderers show up and start killing the town's prostitutes. He meets a wealthy thug who he makes a deal with to get the money, but he might have just run out of time.

movies.title: The Choice
movies.summary: In a small coastal town, the veterinarian Travis Shaw works with his father Shep and is very close to his beloved sister Steph. Travis is very successful with the women and dates Monica every now and then. When the resident Gabby Holland moves to the next door house, she initially believes he is a pretentious man. But when her boyfriend Ryan MacCarthy, who is fellow doctor in the same hospital where she works, needs to travel to another city, Gabby and Travis have a relationship and fall in love with each other. Out of the blue, Ryan returns and proposes to marry her. Now Gabby has to make a choice between her two loves.

movies.title: Promare
movies.summary: A futuristic firefighting mecha service is created to protect the world.
movies.description_full: A futuristic firefighting mecha service is created to protect the world.
movies.synopsis: A futuristic firefighting mecha service is created to protect the world.

movies.title: Buddies
movies.summary: In this poignant gay cinema classic, the first film to address the AIDS pandemic, a New York City gay man in a monogamous relationship becomes a "buddy" or volunteer bedside companion to another gay man dying of AIDS. The last film directed by 70s and 80s gay film pioneer Arthur J. Bressan, Jr., who himself died of complications from AIDS just two years after the film was released in 1985.

movies.title: The Guest
movies.summary: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.
